sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组名词均含有"美德"之意。
means: goodness ： 含义最广，侧重固有的仁爱，慷慨等高尚的美德。
integrity ： 指品格的纯正，有高度是非感的美德。
morality ： 强调符合道德标准的行为或用道德准则衡量某事，尤注重男女间的道德品行。
purity ： 侧重于道德上无缺点。
virtue ： 一般用词，指符合道德准则的隐恶扬善行为或品行或指一种有意识去做善事的高尚道德。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"诚实，正直"之意。
means: integrity ： 指品格纯正，有高度是非感，正直诚实，受人敬佩。
honesty ： 普通用词，侧重为人忠厚，老实，正直，不欺骗，不说谎。
justice ： 侧重办事或处事公正、公道不偏心。

word_mean: 信息未经授权不能进行改变的特性。即网络信息在存储或传输过程中保持不被偶然或蓄意地删除、修改、伪造、乱序、重放、插入等行为破坏和丢失的特性。

sentence.Network_en: He inspires affection and respect as a man of unquestionable integrity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无可争议的忠诚正直赢得了人们的爱戴和尊敬。

sentence.Network_en: Separatist movements are a threat to the integrity of the nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 分离主义运动对国家统一是个威胁。

sentence.Network_en: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the Metropolitan Police.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是对伦敦市警察局刚正廉明作风的又一次诽谤。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from French intégrité or Latin integritas, from integer 'intact' (see integer). Compare with entirety, integral, and integrate

encyclopedia.content: INTEGRITY是Green Hills Software公司开发的一个安全、无版权税的实时操作系统。由于没有那些80年代就已经存在的RTOS需要考虑的兼容性问题，INTEGRITY从设计时就应用最新的RTOS技术，并且包含了前所未有的面向电信，国防，网络，医疗器械行业应用需要的可靠性、可用性、服务性。INTEGRITY RTOS是首个根据“POSIX：IEEE和Open Group认证”计划和最新的IEEE 1003．1-2003系统接口产品标准进行认证的操作系统。INTEGRITY使用基于硬件

entry.def: If you have integrity, you are honest and firm in your moral principles.

example.ex: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity...
example.tran: 我一直认为他正直诚实。

example.ex: He was praised for his fairness and high integrity.
example.tran: 他的公正和正直操守受人称道。

entry.def: The integrity of something such as a group of people or a text is its state of being a united whole.

example.ex: Separatist movements are a threat to the integrity of the nation.
example.tran: 分离主义运动对国家统一是个威胁。

means.word_mean: 1. an unreduced or unbroken completeness or totality

auth_sentence.res_content_con: What does that say about her Scientific Integrity Program.

auth_sentence.content: Its mechanical integrity can be compromised at lower temperatures.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its mechanical integrity can be compromised at lower temperatures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its mechanical integrity can be compromised at lower temperatures.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 构成整体所必需的;完整的
stems_affixes.word_buile: integr完整+al……的→adj.构成整体所必需的;完整的
integrate[v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起]+ion表名词→n.综合
integr完整+ity表名词→n.正直,诚实;完整,完全
dis分开+integrate成为一体→v.分裂成小片,瓦解
integr完整+ate使……→v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起

Sentence.sentence: The key to integrity is consistency- not only setting high personal standards for oneself (honesty, responsibility, respect for others, fairness) but also living up to those standards each and every day.
One who has integrity is bound by and follows moral and ethical (道德上的) standards even when making life's hard choices, choices which may be clouded by stress, pressure to succeed, or temptation
But a lapse (缺失) of integrity also affects our relationships with others.

means.word_mean: 正直; 诚实, 诚恳

sentences.en: He is a man of the highest integrity.

means.word_mean: 完整, 完全, 完善

sentences.en: The old Roman walls may still be seen but not in their integrity.
sentences.cn: 古罗马城墙尚可见, 但已残缺不全。

jushi.english: He is a man of the highest integrity.
The old Roman walls may still be seen but not in their integrity.
jushi.chinese: 古罗马城墙尚可见,但已残缺不全。
